00037 #include "egs_ellipse.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 #include "egs_functions.h"
00040 
00041 extern "C" {
00042 
00043 EGS_ELLIPSE_EXPORT EGS_BaseShape* createShape(EGS_Input *input,
00044         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00045     if( !input ) {
00046         egsWarning("createShape(ellipse): null input?\n"); return 0;
00047     }
00048     vector<EGS_Float> axis;
00049     int err = input->getInput("halfaxis",axis);
00050     if( err ) {
00051         egsWarning("createShape(ellipse): no 'halfaxis' input\n"); return 0;
00052     }
00053     if( axis.size() != 2 ) {
00054         egsWarning("createShape(ellipse): 2 instead of %d inputs expected"
00055                 " for keyword 'halfaxis'.\n",axis.size()); return 0;
00056     }
00057     vector<EGS_Float> pos;
00058     err = input->getInput("midpoint",pos);
00059     if( err ) { pos.clear(); pos.push_back(0); pos.push_back(0); }
00060     else {
00061         if( pos.size() != 2 ) {
00062             egsWarning("createShape(ellipse): 2 instead of %d inputs expected"
00063                  " for keyword 'midpoint'. Reseting midpoint to (0,0)\n",
00064                  pos.size());
00065             pos.clear(); pos.push_back(0); pos.push_back(0);
00066         }
00067     }
00068     EGS_EllipseShape *shape = new EGS_EllipseShape(pos[0],pos[1],
00069             axis[0],axis[1],"",f);
00070     shape->setName(input); shape->setTransformation(input);
00071     return shape;
00072 }
00073 
00074 }
